question:
Your friend invited you to his/her party, but you are unable to attend. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
•explain why you cannot come
•give your reason for not contacting your friend sooner
•suggest another time to meetWrite
text: I hope you and your family are in good spirits. I am so sorry that I couldn't write to you any sooner because of work pressure. It was just that I was up against an unrealistic deadline besides my daughter, Sarah, was not keeping up health-wise.

For  starters, I would like to thank you for inviting me to your birthday party on the 18th of August. However, I will be travelling to another city for a work-related matter, so, I will not be able to make it to the party despite planning loads of surprises for you in advance.

That said, we can plan a small get-together on the 22nd of August at my place. I have asked a few mutual friends of ours to join us if they have the time. What's more, I have rented a movie called "Sky Fall", which we are dying to see, starring your favourite actor, Tom Cruise.
Do share your thoughts on this.
